pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Skyler's CLI[![Test](https://github.com/bouldersky/skylers-cli/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/bouldersky/skylers-cli/actions/workflows/test.yml)This is a modular CLI tool box that I tailor to my needs over time. It includes:- A command to bootstrap all my . files onto a new workstation
